27/3/2023, updated on 26/10/2024: Data.gov.my (archived), Tindak Malaysia (2023), Attorney General Chambers, Undi.info, Bernama. For specific Parliamentarian Candidate background details, refer to 2013_Other_Sources_Parliament_File for further information

Candidate Age data will be added at a later stage. Even though Pakatan Rakyat is composed of PAS, PKR, and DAP, there was one seat where Pakatan Rakyat parties clashed. Michael Jeyakumar Devaraj is a PSM member who contested under PKR ticket for Sungai Siput. All Candidate Names were updated to reflect Gazette names. Even though there was no redelineation exercise between 2003 - 18 for Peninsular Malaysia, Labuan, and Sabah and from 2015 for Sarawak, EC has adopted a different Parliamentary Constituency Code numbering for the 2013 Elections. Corrections were made for the party association of N.Gobalkrishnan (Batu Kawan) and Zulkifli Noordin (Shah Alam). Spelling for Kulim - Bandar Baharu was fixed. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
Unique Identifier. For this case, it is the Parliamentary Code
Parliamentary Constituency Code (2003 - 2018). For Sabah, it will be relevant from 2003 to 2019
Parliamentary Constituency Name (2003 - 2018). For Sabah, it will be relevant from 2003 to 2019
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector count using the Principal Electoral Roll of 2011 that was updated with four quarterly rolls of 2012
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll (as in A in all Form 14 + A in Form 15)
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box (as in D in all Form 14) and not returned (as in D in Form 15) (B-C-D)
Total number of rejected ballot papers (as in C in all Form 14 + C in Form 15)
Total number of votes by electors
Barisan Nasional Candidate Name as per the Government Gazette (Form 8)
Barisan Nasional Valid Vote for the Candidate
Indicated if the contestant has lost deposit. If yes, value 'Lost Deposit' is affixed. If none, it is left blank
